dct_title_s: [Series of maps from Fuller's A Pisgah-sight of Palestine and the confines thereof]
dct_alternative_sm: A Pisgah-sight of Palestine and the confines thereof with the history of the Old and New Testament acted thereon
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Scala miliarium".
Iluustrations of coats of arms, cherubs, settlements and structures, ships, people, and Biblical events throughout.
Each map has descriptive text throughout, decorative cartouches, and seals.
Shows topography, vegetation, drainage, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Appears in Fuller's A Pisgah-sight of Palestine and the confines thereof, with the history of the Old and New Testament acted thereon.
